title: my account info got changed and riots support is to bad to help me
body: Im on my alt account to post this so i stopped playing league for like 2 weeks so i went to get back on and it says my info wasn't right so i retyped everything and it still says it was right so i tryed to reset my password and it say it will be sent to your email after waiting and hour for the email i never got it on any of my emails so i email riot support i get the same copy and pasted email they send to everyone so i spent over 500 on skins and everything to just get my account taken and not get any help from this company cause there support system has no help at all club penguin has better support then riot does

replies.body:
I'm not really sure what copy paste response you're referring to, but any specific details could help a lot.  We definitely want to help you out, but it sounds like you got a generic notification that we received your ticket and not an actual specialist response.  Just to also be sure, you'll want to use our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which will allow you to select an email address you do have access to.  I'm also happy to check on the status of your ticket if you'd like to toss me the #.

You're eager to get your account back, and we are just as much to help do that.
